website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around mouthwash that also helps with whitening.
pros: Whitens teeth, freshens breath, and prevents cavities
Works as promised while being gentle on your mouth
cons: Has an alcohol taste that some do not like

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try
customer_reviews.text: I don't like a lot of mouth washes. This is one of the very few that I do. The other...is Listerine as well. My issue is the taste. I don't like the mint taste so when you are faced with pretty much mint this or mint that, you have to decide which mint taste you can tolerate. (Yes, I know some offer some other flavors, but have you ever tried them...oh..ugghh!) Anyway, this is worth a try. I usually buy at the store, but saw they have it at Amazon so thought I would add it to my box of household items I was having delivered.
customer_reviews.author: MJCar

customer_reviews.title: Everyone’s tastes are different but to me it tastes horrible. I tried to give it away and they ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would! Everyone’s tastes are different but to me it tastes horrible. I tried to give it away and they hated it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sully2013

customer_reviews.title: Best Teeth Whitening/Mmouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Really helps in keeping my teeth white and was the first company to come out with such kind of mouth wash / teeth Whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whiten as stated, a little expensive though!
customer_reviews.text: Works really good. A little ty tel expensive though. It does Whiten you teeth. Use it in my water pic! Judy M.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size
customer_reviews.text: For pricing, thought I was getting the bigger bottle. Disappointed in size, only place can find gentle formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a strong mouth wash but leaves your mouth feeling very clean
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes yucky, works well...
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but the taste is a bit terrible, at least until you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This stuff burns. Let's hope it's frying all the bacteria away right? Seriously though, It leaves my mouth feeling clean and my breath smells nice. That's the point, so it succeeds.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: It obviously does the job, but the taste is ...
customer_reviews.text: It obviously does the job, but the taste is awful!! I almost rinsed with water the first time because the taste was overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Vartika

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite listerine because my teeth look so white and clean ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite listerine because my teeth look so white and clean after using it. People comment on how nice my teeth look.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

customer_reviews.title: My bad.. should have paid closer attention
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I expected. My bad..should have paid closer attention.
customer_reviews.author: zoom

customer_reviews.title: The package was  empty yesterday when I got home.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. That's why I bought it again. I was not happy that the package was empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Taste isn't the greatest, but what can you expect from a tooth whitening mouthwash that seems to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed in size. For mouthwash in excess of $7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed in size. For mouthwash in excess of $7, I expected something taller than a beer bottle. Kind of a rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hedquist

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, removes stains without any gum or tooth ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, removes stains without any gum or tooth irritation. great for those who cannot use the teeth whitening products due to sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Panarello

customer_reviews.title: Effective mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Mixed equally with Listerine Vibrant makes a very effective mouth wash,
customer_reviews.author: Gene Marchand

customer_reviews.title: ... thought it would be minty tasting and not anything like the original nasty Listerine
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be minty tasting and not anything like the original nasty Listerine.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not the 32 oz bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bottle. For this price I thought it would be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rush

customer_reviews.title: Ouch, allergic reaction I guess
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this ended up being a waste of money as something within the liquid caused an allergic reaction that was quite unpleasant. I'm told that "anti cavity" type mouthwashes can cause this reaction in users so just be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Frog Hat

customer_reviews.title: Like really gross
customer_reviews.text: Tastes gross. Like really gross. So not worth whatever tiny bit of whitening it's doing.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dentist. I use it with my water pik.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Larrowe

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I love Listerine Whitening and praise it over the other mouthwash brands I've used (Scope and Crest). It is gentle and doesn't taste bad at all. Most people think it's gross when I tell them I only brush my teeth once a day, but I brush my teeth for over two minutes along with flossing and using mouthwash after I've eaten breakfast. The dentist and his assistants were floored when I told them I only brushed once a day, because there was absolutely nothing wrong with my teeth and they are clean. The big difference that takes my teeth from a pale white-yellow to a nice bright white is this mouthwash, 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: WHERE IS MY FAVORITE MOUTHWASH???
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mouthwash!!!! Why is it off the market??? Ive searched so many stores and I'm almost tired of looking, but this whitens the best for me without that bubbly build up on the tongue after I rinse. Please, bring it back!!?
customer_reviews.author: SunshineKeturrr

customer_reviews.title: No whitening and gum recession
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend it. I've been getting gum recessions when using it. I used it for a few weeks about a year ago and my gums started receding. So I stopped and recently started trying it again, and the same thing happened. I have not seen any reviews stating this, and no I do not have a dentist's diagnosis, so perhaps I'm wrong. However, the receding has coincidentally occurred when using it. And aside from that, it does not actually whiten my teeth when following the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Rob E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the price
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for quite a while, disappointed in the price. Guess I should have paid more attention, this is 1 liter and I was expecting 2 liter size.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Clean teeth
customer_reviews.text: It works. Cleans and removes build up from the teeth and whitens.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Renner

customer_reviews.title: Minty without a bad aftertaste and whitens!
customer_reviews.text: Minty and whitens - the gentle doesn't have as bad of an aftertaste as the regular. Reasonably priced here too.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy R.

customer_reviews.title: FRESH
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be doing the job of whitening and freshening.
customer_reviews.author: rakooi

product_meta.title: Listerine Healthy White Anticavity Peroxide-Free Fluoride Mouthwash, Gentle Mouth Rinse for Teeth Whitening, Stain Remover and Bad Breath, Clean Mint, 16 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Whiten your teeth without irritation with Listerine Healthy White mouthwash, made with a peroxide-free formula for gentle oral care. This anticavity mouth rinse with sodium fluoride removes and prevents tough stains while being gentle on enamel. It also kills germs that can cause bad breath to leave your mouth feeling fresh and clean after each use. Listerine Healthy White mouth rinse features a refreshing clean mint flavor. Use this fluoride mouthwash twice daily for a healthier, naturally white smile.
feature_bullets: 16-fluid ounces of Listerine Healthy White Peroxide-Free Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash for gentle multi-action oral care
Anticavity teeth whitening mouthwash protects teeth by preventing cavities and tooth decay while also whitening teeth without irritating teeth or gums for a healthier smile
Peroxide-free formula is gentle on enamel as it works to remove and prevent teeth stains without damaging teeth
Mint mouthwash kills the germs that can cause bad breath to leave your whole mouth feeling fresh and clean
Rinse with this anticavity whitening mouthwash two times per day as part of your daily oral care routine for a healthier, naturally white smile
